title: Boutique Riverside Escape in the Heart of Cheshire with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: In the very heart of rural Cheshire lies the picturesque and unspoilt village of Prestbury, home to The Bridge Prestbury, the perfect location for a quintessential English countryside escape. This boutique stay sits on the peaceful banks of the River Bollin and blends old and new interiors with an industrial nod. Sip on a cocktail at The Shed while enjoying a relaxing alfresco dining experience or enjoy all-day dining on dishes bursting with local flavour at the onsite restaurant.
offer_address: The Village, Prestbury, Macclesfield SK10 4DQ, United Kingdom
